title: Fontosaurus.com Out of Coma! Talking and Handing Out Fonts!
content:
So I finally got my site issues behind me -- after a couple of years of struggling with ASP, then PHP, I found Ruby on Rails. It wasn't a smooth relationship at points, but the actual development of the site was a cakewalk. (Deployment was tough, however.)

[http://www.fontosaurus.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014194437/http:/www.fontosaurus.com/ "http://www.fontosaurus.com")

Free fonts for now, with the e-commerce functionality following soon!
author: fontosaurus

comments.content: Hey there! It's good to see you back in the game.
